title: Why the Caesar Retrieval Arc was Perfect Filler
author: kereeachan
description: A blog post analyzing why the Caesar Retrieval Arc works well as a filler arc despite being anime-original. The author praises its brevity, effective villain design, and logical power system with clear weaknesses.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the complete Caesar Retrieval Arc (episodes 626-628)

title: 626-628: Caesar Goes Missing. The Pirate Alliance Makes A Sortie!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A first-time viewer's detailed recap and reaction to episodes 626-628 of the Caesar Retrieval Arc, providing fresh perspective on this filler content.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Spoils the entire Caesar Retrieval Arc

title: Some Unskippable Filler Arcs In One Piece
author: GameRant Staff
description: An article discussing which One Piece filler arcs are worth watching, including the Caesar Retrieval Arc. Describes it as offering an entertaining diversion for fans of the series.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for various filler arcs including Caesar Retrieval

title: Haki Users One Piece Fans Wish Were Canon
author: CBR Staff
description: An article discussing non-canon characters who use Haki, including the Kung Fu Dugong from the Caesar Retrieval Arc. Explores fan interest in seeing these anime-original Haki users incorporated into the main story.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses the Kung Fu Dugong's Haki abilities from episode 626
